description:
This family oriented course for creating a basic decorations for yout Christmas tree!

Have fun creating Christmas tree decorations, your kids will love to participate in this fun little course

What we will do:

  • You have a choice of templates you can print out and create great little tree decorations
  • You will use simple easy to obtain items to create your decorations

What the parents need to do!
As we will be using knives it is important to prepare the initial stages for your children, but these are quick and easy to do so dont worry :)

Most important have fun make a mess and enjoy!!!

Items you will need!

  • Sellotape
  • Brushes small cheap ones
  • Mixing pot
  • Craft glue
  • Thin cardboard (you could use cereal boxes! up-cycle)
  • Cotton
  • Glitter or Sequins (anything small and decorative even small sea shells!)

Enjoy the festive season with the family and get decorating your Tree!!!!
title: Making fantastic Christmas Decorations with your family
